meanings.definition: The act of arranging items in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent1: I alphabetization my books to make them easier to find.
meanings.sent2: The librarian used alphabetization to sort the books on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: The alphabetization of the spices in the kitchen made cooking more fun.
meanings.sent4: Her alphabetization of thoughts helped her make sense of the chaos in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The alphabetization of the files was like putting together a puzzle.

meanings.definition: The process of organizing information in alphabetical sequence.
meanings.sent1: Alphabetization is important for quickly locating names in a directory.
meanings.sent2: The alphabetization of the index made it easier to navigate the document.
meanings.sent3: The alphabetization of the grocery list made shopping more efficient.
meanings.sent4: In the digital age, alphabetization is key to effective online searches.
meanings.sent5: The alphabetization of the cards in the game made it more enjoyable to play.
